natural solution: We know that $\gcd(a,b) \cdot \mathop{\text{lcm}}[a,b] = ab$ for all positive integers $a$ and $b$.
Hence, in this case, $10 \cdot 280 = n \cdot 40$, so $n = 10 \cdot 280/40 = \boxed{70}$.
